title: 3 bedroom furnished house in Colombo 3 for rent
details:
This two storied house is located in highly residential area in Colombo 3 and house consist with

3 bed room and 2 bath rooms
large hall with dining area
Fitted pantry with wet kitchen
Maids room with maids wash room
Floor area 3000sqft
covered parking for two vehicles and space available for parking on the road since this is a private road.

Expected price 250000/month

For further information call on 0777-362600/ 0777-878138
